title: San Diego/Mission Beach-Pacific Beach
name: Mission Bay Playground
address: East Mission Bay Drive on Mission Bay, south of Clairemont Drive
content: There are many playgrounds in the city, but this one is easily one of the best. For starters, it's a huge playground, with several elaborate play structures (one is built to resemble a pirate ship) and lots of elements for kids to explore. The setting is also ideal, located on the edge of Mission Bay and surrounded by expansive lawns perfect for kite-flying and playing sports.
